mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_messages ( session_id, user_id, role, content, room_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{sessionId}, #{userId}, #{role}, #{content}, #{roomId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, session_id as sessionId, user_id as userId, role, content, room_id as roomId, created_at as createdAt FROM chat_messages WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at ASC

SELECT session_id as sessionId, COUNT(*) as messageCount, MAX(created_at) as lastMessageAt, MIN(created_at) as firstMessageAt FROM chat_messages WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY session_id ORDER BY lastMessageAt DESC

SELECT id, session_id as sessionId, user_id as userId, role, content, room_id as roomId, created_at as createdAt FROM chat_messages WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
